title: About
text:
As I continue progressing towards the completion of my degree this site will serve as a source for my key academic projects.

Courses
import pandas as pd


Course data
courses = { “Course Name”: [ “Cloud Analytics for Business”, “Project Management”, “Financial Concepts”, “Enterprise Risk Management”, “Quantitative and Qualitative Decision Making”, “Business Analytics Foundations” ], “Course Status”: [ “Current”, “Completed”, “Completed”, “Completed”, “Completed”, “Completed” ] }


Create DataFrame without index
df = pd.DataFrame(courses)


Apply styling
styled_df = df.style.set_table_styles([ {‘selector’: ‘th’, ‘props’: [(‘text-align’, ‘center’), (‘background-color’, ‘#0B3D91’), (‘color’, ‘white’), (‘padding’, ‘8px’), (‘font-family’, ‘Arial, sans-serif’)]}, {‘selector’: ‘td’, ‘props’: [(‘text-align’, ‘center’), (‘background-color’, ‘#D6E1F0’), (‘color’, ‘black’), # now black text (‘padding’, ‘6px’), (‘font-family’, ‘Arial, sans-serif’)]}, {‘selector’: ‘table’, ‘props’: [(‘margin-left’, ‘auto’), (‘margin-right’, ‘auto’), (‘border-collapse’, ‘collapse’), (‘width’, ‘60%’)]}]).hide(axis=‘index’) # hides the 0-5 index column


Return the styled table for Quarto to render
styled_df

title: Hello
text:
Welcome to my page!

About Me
I’m an insurance professional pursuing a Master of Science in Insurance Management with a concentration in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University.


Portfolio
This site will feature my ongoing academic projects during my studies.


Courses

- Cloud Analytics for Business
